ISSUE.TITLE: Flowable Admin - Process Engine - Migrate process instance - Only 10 versions avaliable
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: At Migrate Process Instance dialog Floable Admin displays only the first ten process definitions of an app. ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/477378/58434062-4010ce80-8090-11e9-80ba-1e87cba5c7b4.png)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Fix wrong privilege mapping delete call #1878

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Support more than 10 process definition versions in migration dialog #1770
